education.name: Helderkruin Primary
education.description: I spent my primary school years at Helderkruin Primary, where I acquired fundamental knowledge and made my first friends. It was during this period that I discovered my passion for computers and games.

education.name: Malibu High School
education.description: I spent my final years of school at Malibu High School, where I gained a wealth of knowledge and grew into the person I am today. It was during this period that my interest in coding sparked.

education.name: Life Choices Academy
education.description: I started my journey as a developer at Life Choices Academy, where the main focus of the course is web development. This program has been a significant kickstart to my career.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: We were tasked during the Javascript module to build a To-do list. It was quite a fun experience and it elevated my skills in applying Javascript to the next level. This was also one of the things that I had the most trouble building but eventually with time and effort, I got everything to work the way I wanted it to.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my Javascript Calculator. Probably one of my most favourite projects that I have build. I even added my own extra twist by adding the keyboard functions. I am hoping to fix the keyboard functions soon. I learnt so much while building this application and I also use it whenever I need to calculate something.

projects.name: Random Meme Generator
projects.description: This was a project that I built using an API that generates random memes. Before we started learning how to use and manipulate APIs, I took initiative one day whilst being bored to build my own project and this amazing, entertaining app is what I ended up building as I enjoy looking at memes, I sometimes use this app for myself when I'm bored.

projects.name: Stop Watch
projects.description: This is a project I built once when I was incredibly bored at home. I wanted to learn more about Javascript timing functions and searched for a project to build and I got this on a website that gave random projects for developers to try and build, it was quite difficult but I eventually got the hang of it and figured it out. This is also one of my most favourite projects that I ever built.

projects.name: Pokédex App
projects.description: Another project I built to improve my skill using Javascript. This Pokédex gives you basic data about the popular anime series, Pokémon's first group of Pokémon.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: This was a small game that I decided to build during my free time. I had fun building this and this improved my skill and implementation skills using Javascript.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: This was a temperature converter that I built one day during class out of boredom. This application converts from Celsius to Farenheit and vice versa. At the time, it was quite a simple task as I was getting quite used to using and implementing Javascript, however this also assisted in improving my skills using Javascript.

projects.name: Javascript End Of Module Project
projects.description: This was my second End Of Module Project that I built. It is an e-commerce website that uses local storage to change, update, create and delete products. It was not completely finished but I am looking forward to correcting soon. In the duration of this project, I learnt so much about myself as a developer in this time.

testimonials.name: Laiquah Cotie
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is a team player and possesses a vibrant personality. He is a hard worker who consistently strives to exceed the set standards. I highly recommend him if you are in need of someone who is committed, motivated, and dedicated to completing tasks.

testimonials.name: Ganiefah Majiet
testimonials.testimonial: It's always a pleasure to work with Eighton-Lee. He has an infectious personality and consistently brings out the best in others. He is a motivating presence, always ready to offer a helping hand to anyone in need. With his go-getter mindset, he diligently pursues his goals and strives to achieve the best results. I wholeheartedly recommend him.

testimonials.name: Nuraan Samodien
testimonials.testimonial: From my perspective, Eighton-Lee is a highly intelligent individual. He exudes passion, ambition, and a strong work ethic, always willing to lend a helping hand to those in need. His exceptional communication and leadership skills make him a valuable asset to any team or company fortunate enough to have him.

testimonials.name: Mish-Al Taliep
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is an excellent student who is constantly striving for improvement and seeking opportunities to enhance his skills. He demonstrates strong work ethics and consistently excels academically.

testimonials.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Eighton-Lee was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend Eighton-Lee to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.

testimonials.name: Joel Mukhanya
testimonials.testimonial: Eighton-Lee is well-behaved, sociable, and highly dedicated. He thrives in collaborative environments, working effectively with his peers on various projects. His knowledge includes HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and Vue.js.
